Conjuration 5

Summon Zmey

EA Rus,  MA Vanarus,  LA Bogarus

Ritual
F2
spell id [id]: 244
effect number [effect_number]: 1
damage [damage]: 1940
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 5F
Summon Units:#1940 Zmey
The caster summons a Zmey. The Zmey is a three headed dragon capable of breathing flames. It is larger than a wyvern, but smaller than a true dragon. It is indigenous to the lands of Rus and can be summoned by Fire mages.
